actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Judiciary.

official_title: To amend the Lanham Act to prevent the admission into the United States of articles of imported merchandise that are labeled with the name of a foreign country in contravention of the law of the country.

summary.text: Amends the Lanham Act to prohibit the importation of articles that are labeled with the name of a foreign country in violation of the law of such foreign country.

titles.title: To amend the Lanham Act to prevent the admission into the United States of articles of imported merchandise that are labeled with the name of a foreign country in contravention of the law of the country.
